entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3 except minus 9 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early this evening. Low minus 3 except minus 9 inland. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 28 December 2022
